welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Borehamwood, a charming town steeped in history and known for its beautiful green spaces and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly European and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights to Asia and the Americas.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights to Africa and the Middle East.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then paid options available.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport offers exclusive services for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the terminal.
